job.remarks: Run on Tuesday on 11.30 to send orders for the coming 4 days

step.datasource: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN r.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as doQuit FROM (VALUES (0)) l(v) LEFT JOIN dbo._AB_Entity_Log r WITH (NOLOCK) ON r.jobid = '%jobid%' AND r.runid <> '%runid%' AND r.syscreated > DATEADD(HOUR, -2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) -- check for max 2 hours back AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM dbo._AB_Entity_Log r1 WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r1.runid = r.runid AND r1.seqno = -10) -- -10 is 'Finished Running Job'

--DELETE FROM [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders INSERT INTO [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders (RowId, ordernr, refer, docnumber, selcode, debnr, ord_debtor_name, del_debnr,del_debtor_name, del_AddressLine1, del_PostCode, del_City, del_landcode, del_contactperson, del_phone, Rownr,Itemcode, Description,CustomerItemcode,isSerialNumberItem, DeliveryDate, Quantity, PcsWeight, NetWeight, runid )
select r.id as RowId, k.ordernr, k.refer, k.docnumber, k.selcode ,k.debnr, k.ord_debtor_name ,k.verzdebnr as del_debnr,del_debtor_name, del_AddressLine1, del_PostCode, del_City, del_landcode, del_contactperson, del_phone ,r.regel as Rownr ,i.Itemcode ,i.Description ,ia.ItemCodeAccount ,i.isSerialNumberItem ,r.afldat as DeliveryDate ,r.esr_aantal as Qty ,r.gewicht_bi as PcsWeight ,r.gewicht_bi * r.esr_aantal as NetWeight ,'%runid%' as runid
from [%abeisourcedb%]..orkrg k with (NOLOCK) inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..orsrg r with (NOLOCK) ON k.ordernr = r.ordernr inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..items i with (NOLOCK) ON i.itemcode = r.artcode inner join [%abeisourcedb%]..itemaccounts ia with (NOLOCK) on ia.itemcode = i.itemcode and ia.accountcode = 'D026F37D-3D37-4031-A626-117DB7D67EE5' -- 974605 WHERE k.ord_soort = 'V' and k.afgehandld = 0 -- Select Open orders and r.pakbon_afg = 0 and r.ar_soort != 'T' AND r.ar_soort != 'P' -- With Item rows AND k.debnr = '974605' -- DAF ME2 AND r.magcode = '30' AND k.selcode = '1' AND r.afldat <= DATEADD(DAY, 4, GETDATE()) -- Released orders within 4 days AND r.id not IN (SELECT rowid from [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders)
SELECT TOP (1) 0 as doQuit FROM dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders r with (nolock) WHERE r.runid = '%runid%'

INSERT INTO _AB_tb_VRExportDocuments (FileContent, FileName, FileType, Syscreated, runid)
SELECT CONVERT( VARCHAR(MAX), ( select 1 as company, -- 1=VanReenen 2=Tranex 13 as ediprovider, -- 13=Warehouse CONCAT('WAREHOUSEOUTBOUND_', CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(),112), '.xml') AS sourcefilename, (SELECT -- orders (SELECT -- order 2 as mutationtype, -- 1=inbound 2=outbound (SELECT 1 AS [@matchmode], '73444' FOR XML PATH ('customer_id'), type) , -- customer id Orlaco (SELECT 1 AS [@matchmode], '01' FOR XML PATH ('branch_id'), type) , -- 01=warehouse (SELECT 0 AS [@matchmode], 26 FOR XML PATH ('warehouse_id'), type) , -- 26=VanReenen LEFT(CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120),10) AS orderdate, o.ordernr AS reference, LEFT(CONVERT(varchar,o.DeliveryDate,120),10) as deliverydate, '8:00' AS deliverytime, '12:00' AS deliverytimetill, (SELECT 11 AS [@matchmode], '' + o.del_debnr FOR XML PATH ('address_id'), type) , o.del_debtor_name AS addressname, o.del_AddressLine1 AS addressstreet, o.del_PostCode AS addresszipcode, (SELECT 4 AS [@matchmode], '' + o.del_City FOR XML PATH ('addresscity_id'), type) , (SELECT 2 AS [@matchmode], '' + o.del_landcode FOR XML PATH ('addresscountry_id'), type) , o.refer AS deliveryreference, o.del_phone as deliveryphone, o.del_contactperson AS deliverycontact, (SELECT 9 AS [@matchmode], '356' FOR XML PATH ('sender_id'), type) , -- sender id ?? (SELECT 9 AS [@matchmode], '' + o.del_debnr FOR XML PATH ('receiver_id'), type) , 1 as transportsubcontracted, 1 as scanning, o.refer AS edireference, (SELECT -- orderlines ( SELECT -- orderline (SELECT 3 AS [@matchmode], '' + [Itemcode] FOR XML PATH ('article_id'), type) , CONVERT(decimal(10,2),[Quantity]) AS unitamount, (SELECT 1 AS [@matchmode], 'STK' FOR XML PATH ('unit_id'), type) , LEFT(CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120),10) AS pickdate, (SELECT 0 AS [@matchmode], 26 FOR XML PATH ('warehouse_id'), type) , CONVERT(decimal(10,2),[Quantity]) AS stockunits, CONVERT(decimal(10,2),[NetWeight]) AS weigth, r.ordernr AS reference, r.refer AS edireference, 0 as autogeneratemutations FROM dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders r where r.ordernr = o.ordernr and r.runid = '%runid%' FOR XML PATH ('orderline'), type) FOR XML PATH ('orderlines'), type)
FROM dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders o where o.runid = '%runid%' group by o.ordernr, o.deliverydate, o.del_debnr, o.del_debtor_name, o.del_AddressLine1, o.del_PostCode, o.del_City, o.del_landcode ,o.refer,o.del_phone, o.del_contactperson FOR XML PATH ('order'), type) FOR XML PATH ('orders'), type) FOR XML PATH ('import') ,type ) ) AS content, CONCAT('WAREHOUSEOUTBOUND_', CONVERT(VARCHAR,GETDATE(),112), '.xml') AS sourcefilename, 'WAREHOUSEOUTBOUND' AS FileType, GETDATE() AS Syscreated, '%runid%' as runid
SELECT FileContent, FileName FROM [%abeisourcedb%].dbo._AB_tb_VRExportDocuments WHERE runid = '%runid%'

Select s.ordernr as OrderNumber, s.ordernr as projectNr, 24 as type, 'D026F37D-3D37-4031-A626-117DB7D67EE5' as CmpWwn, d.FileContent as Body, d.Filename AS BinaryFilename, d.Filename as Subject from [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders s inner join [ABSC_data].dbo._AB_tb_VRExportDocuments d on s.runid = d.runid where s.runid = '%runid%'

select top 100 PERCENT ordernr, refer, docnumber, debnr, ord_debtor_name, rownr, itemcode, description, CustomerItemcode, Quantity, DeliveryDate FROM [ABSC_Data].dbo._AB_tb_VRSalesOrders where runid = '%runid%' ORDER BY ordernr, rownr
step.contentbody:
Dear order entry,

the following orders are send for delivery to external warehouse Van Reenen .






OrdernrReference Order descriptionDebtorDebtor nameRowItemcodeDescriptionCustomer ItemcodeQuantityDelivery Date
%ordernr%%refer%%docnumber%%debnr%%ord_debtor_name%%rownr%%itemcode%%description%%CustomerItemcode%%Quantity%%DeliveryDate%
step.stepname: Mail OrderEntry for all send order rows
